author: der
msg: Experimental RDFS rule set for the LP engine

author: ian_dickinson
msg: Updated Jena.java to contain more reliable meta-data about the overall
Jena package, and moved it from rdf.model to the top level. Adjusted
the build script to substitute version number and other parameters
during the build.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Added reification style constants to ModelFactory. Updated the reification
document, now version 1.0. Dunno what I did to PrefixMapping.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Arranged for the toString() of Nodes (hence, resources) to display the
lang tags of literals (using a suffixed "~lang" syntax). Also arranged
for literals to be optionally quoted, and for URIs to be optionally
prefix-compressed, using a Node::toString(PrefixMapping,boolean) method.
Graph::toString() (hence, Model::toString()) will quote literals and
compress URIs using the Graph's PrefixMapping.
I have also changed StatementImpl to quote literal objects. This is
a user-visible change but is likely to be harmless.
PrintUtil thought toString() was a safe content-preserving thing to
do to Nodes. I have disabused it of that notion.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Corrected reifier bugs & test bugs; needs some careful subsequent
thought.
Also arranged that literals get "@lang" suffixed if they have a nontrivial
language tag.
Too much code depends on LiteralLabel.toString() not quoting its contents.
